title: Face-Centric Gaze Anticipation
abstract: The main focus of my internship at the Institut de Robòtica i Informàtica Industrial (IRI) in Barcelona was to improve the work of Lai et al. (2024) and their paper Listen to Look into the Future: Audio-Visual Egocentric Gaze Anticipation by making the model more face-centric through face segmentation, and thus improve the performance of gaze prediction in social settings, an area that the authors noted has been neglected so far.
